Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Graveyard \Grave"yard"\, n. A yard or inclosure for the interment of the dead; a cemetery. [1913 Webster]
graveyard n : a tract of land used for burials [syn: {cemetery}, {burial site}, {burial ground}, {burying ground}, {memorial park}, {necropolis}]
